title: Truffle migrate fails with parity --chain dev
body:
- [X] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

Truffle migrate fails with parity --chain dev

## Steps to Reproduce

`parity --chain dev --jsonrpc-apis web3,eth,net,personal,parity,parity_set,traces,rpc,parity_accounts --unlock 0x123... --password pwd.txt  -lrpc=trace`

`truffle migrate --verbose-rpc`

## Expected Behavior

The migration occurs.

## Actual Results

truffle hangs and keep sending `eth_getFilterChanges` forever.

## Environment

* Operating System: osx
* Truffle version: 3.2.1
* Ethereum client: Parity/v1.7.0-unstable-801a2339e-20170331/x86_64-macos/rustc1.16.0
* node version: 7.8.0
* npm version: 4.2.0

Parity:
```
2017-04-05 10:45:09   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":\"17\",\"id\":5}").
2017-04-05 10:45:09   TRACE rpc  Request: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":6,"method":"eth_sendTransaction","params":[{"from":"0x00611c69c94d39bf9a8cd5867e633603b9e84186","gas":"0x47e7c4","gasPrice":"0x174876e800","data":"0x6060604052..."}]}.
2017-04-05 10:45:09   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":\"0xc2a1edded12049444d2e345a3ad60385f498b0912e699cafbbe06c6713bb9ab9\",\"id\":6}").
2017-04-05 10:45:09   TRACE rpc  Request: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":7,"method":"eth_newBlockFilter","params":[]}.
2017-04-05 10:45:09   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":\"0x0\",\"id\":7}").
2017-04-05 10:45:09   TRACE rpc  Request: [{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":8,"method":"eth_getFilterChanges","params":["0x0"]}].
2017-04-05 10:45:09   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("[{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":[\"0x81065fa8b6f88f7d6807aa99950e449ee0995c4a438641b4620373b4dae13bbd\"],\"id\":8}]").
2017-04-05 10:45:09   TRACE rpc  Request: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":9,"method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xc2a1edded12049444d2e345a3ad60385f498b0912e699cafbbe06c6713bb9ab9"]}.
2017-04-05 10:45:09   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":null,\"id\":9}").
2017-04-05 10:45:09   TRACE rpc  Request: [{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":10,"method":"eth_getFilterChanges","params":["0x0"]}].
2017-04-05 10:45:09   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("[{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":[],\"id\":10}]").
2017-04-05 10:45:10   TRACE rpc  Request: [{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":11,"method":"eth_getFilterChanges","params":["0x0"]}].
2017-04-05 10:45:10   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("[{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":[],\"id\":11}]").
2017-04-05 10:45:10   TRACE rpc  Request: [{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":12,"method":"eth_getFilterChanges","params":["0x0"]}].
2017-04-05 10:45:10   DEBUG rpc  Response: Some("[{\"jsonrpc\":\"2.0\",\"result\":[],\"id\":12}]").
2017-04-05 10:45:11   TRACE rpc  Request: [{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":13,"method":"eth_getFilterChanges","params":["0x0"]}].
```

Truffle:
```
  > {
   >   "jsonrpc": "2.0",
   >   "id": 6,
   >   "method": "eth_sendTransaction",
   >   "params": [
   >     {
   >       "from": "0x00611c69c94d39bf9a8cd5867e633603b9e84186",
   >       "gas": "0x47e7c4",
   >       "gasPrice": "0x174876e800",
   >       "data": "0x6060604..."
   >     }
   >   ]
   > }
 <   {
 <     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
 <     "result": "0xc2a1edded12049444d2e345a3ad60385f498b0912e699cafbbe06c6713bb9ab9",
 <     "id": 6
 <   }
   > {
   >   "jsonrpc": "2.0",
   >   "id": 7,
   >   "method": "eth_newBlockFilter",
   >   "params": []
   > }
 <   {
 <     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
 <     "result": "0x0",
 <     "id": 7
 <   }
   > [
   >   {
   >     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
   >     "id": 8,
   >     "method": "eth_getFilterChanges",
   >     "params": [
   >       "0x0"
   >     ]
   >   }
   > ]
 <   [
 <     {
 <       "jsonrpc": "2.0",
 <       "result": [
 <         "0x81065fa8b6f88f7d6807aa99950e449ee0995c4a438641b4620373b4dae13bbd"
 <       ],
 <       "id": 8
 <     }
 <   ]
   > {
   >   "jsonrpc": "2.0",
   >   "id": 9,
   >   "method": "eth_getTransactionReceipt",
   >   "params": [
   >     "0xc2a1edded12049444d2e345a3ad60385f498b0912e699cafbbe06c6713bb9ab9"
   >   ]
   > }
 <   {
 <     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
 <     "result": null,
 <     "id": 9
 <   }
   > [
   >   {
   >     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
   >     "id": 10,
   >     "method": "eth_getFilterChanges",
   >     "params": [
   >       "0x0"
   >     ]
   >   }
   > ]
 <   [
 <     {
 <       "jsonrpc": "2.0",
 <       "result": [],
 <       "id": 10
 <     }
 <   ]
   > [
   >   {
   >     "jsonrpc": "2.0",
   >     "id": 11,
   >     "method": "eth_getFilterChanges",
   >     "params": [
   >       "0x0"
   >     ]
   >   }
   > ]
```
Still open since April... Did you ever figure out how to work around this problem?

Not quite the solution I expected (i.e. using Truffle with the parity dev
chain) but definitely interesting. Thank you.

On Thu, Nov 2, 2017 at 9:54 PM, GeoffreySari <notifications@github.com>

Just leaving a note for further reference here, work was done over the summer at `web3 1.0` to address the Parity instant seal issue in this [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/web3.js/pull/936)

Thank you for raising this issue! It has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed in 7 days if no further activity occurs. If you would like to keep this issue open, please respond with information about the current state of this problem.

There has been no new activity on this issue since it was marked as stale 7 days ago, so it is being automatically closed.  If you'd like help with this or a different problem, please open a new issue. Thanks!
